name="GetConfiguration"> <WL5G3N1:documentation>This operation retrieves an Entiry Configuration and its details (the contents of its configuration items). Entity id and the configure version number are required to fetch a particular entity configuration.</WL5G3N1:documentation> <WL5G3N1:input message="WL5G3N5:GetConfigurationRequest"/> <WL5G3N1:output message="WL5G3N5:GetConfigurationResponse"/> <WL5G3N1:fault name="GetConfigurationFault" message="WL5G3N5:GetConfigurationFault"/> <WL5G3N1:fault name="InventoryFault" message="WL5G3N5:InventoryFault"/> <WL5G3N1:fault name="ValidationFault" message="WL5G3N5:ValidationFault"/> </WL5G3N1:operation> <WL5G3N1:operation name="UpdateConfiguration"> <WL5G3N1:documentation>This operation is used to transition the state of the Service/Service Configuration based on the business action performed. Service Id and Service action is a required to transition Service state. Service Id, Service Configuration Id or Service Configuration Version number and configuration action is required to transition the service configuration state. Success or failure message is included in response.</WL5G3N1:documentation> <WL5G3N1:input message="WL5G3N5:UpdateConfigurationRequest"/> <WL5G3N1:output use="literal"/> </WL5G3N1:input> <WL5G3N1:output> <WL5G3N6:body use="literal"/> </WL5G3N1:output> <WL5G3N1:fault name="UpdateConfigurationFault"> <WL5G3N6:fault name="UpdateConfigurationFault" use="literal"/> </WL5G3N1:fault> <WL5G3N1:fault name="InventoryFault"> <WL5G3N6:fault name="InventoryFault" use="literal"/> </WL5G3N1:fault> <WL5G3N1:fault name="ValidationFault"> <WL5G3N6:fault name="ValidationFault" use="literal"/> </WL5G3N1:fault> </WL5G3N1:operation> </WL5G3N1:binding> <WL5G3N1:service name="UIMServiceFulfillment"> <WL5G3N1:port name="UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTPPort" binding="WL5G3N5:UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTPSoapBinding"> <WL5G3N6:address location="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP"/> </WL5G3N1:port> <WL5G3N1:port name="UIMServiceFulfillmentJMSPort" binding="WL5G3N5:UIMServiceFulfillmentJMSSoapBinding"> <WL5G3N6:address location="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentJMS?URI=inventoryWSQueue"/> </WL5G3N1:port> </WL5G3N1:service> </WL5G3N1:definitions>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/common" xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice" xmlns:appfault="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/framework/webservice/fault/v1-0" xmlns:invcom="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/common" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/framework/webservice/fault/v1-0" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/FaultRoot.xsd"/> <!--================= Parent Classes =======================--> <xsd:complexType name="InventoryRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines base type for all Requests for UIM Web Services. All common attributes of UIM requests will be part of this type.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="header" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Stores Header information that is optional.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="InventoryResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Base type for Response used for all the Web Services Operations in UIM.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="warnings" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Warnings, if any.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="errors" nillable="true" type="appfault:ApplicationFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Errors, if Any.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="messages" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Debug Messages, if Any and the messageConfirmation is not set.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CharacteristicDataValueType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Characteristic information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:EntityValueType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Characteristic Name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="value" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Characteristic value</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="MessageConfirmation"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message Confirmation</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ignore"/> <xsd:enumeration value="required"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="EntityKeyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An id of an entity within the instance of the Provisioning application.Could be comination of Ids</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EntityValueType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An id of an entity within the instance of the Provisioning application.Could be combination of Ids</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="RequestContext"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An businessInteraction id for the Provisioning of the application.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="businessInteractionId" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="messageConfirmation" nillable="true" type="invcom:MessageConfirmation"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CommonStubs"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defined Mainly For using the earlier complex definitions for wsdl generation</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="stub1" nillable="true" type="invcom:EntityValueType"/> <xsd:element name="stub2" nillable="true" type="invcom:InventoryRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="stub3" nillable="true" type="invcom:InventoryResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="stub4" nillable="true" type="invcom:MessageConfirmation"/> <xsd:element name="stub5" nillable="true" type="invcom:EntityKeyType"/> <xsd:element name="stub6" nillable="true" type="invcom:RequestContext"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/framework/webservice/fault/v1-0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:appfault="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/framework/webservice/fault/v1-0"> <complexType name="ApplicationFaultType"> <sequence> <element name="errorCode" nillable="false" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="errorMessage" nillable="true" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="errorContext" nillable="true" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <!--====================== Simple Element Definitions =================--> </schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/fault" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:appfault="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/framework/webservice/fault/v1-0" xmlns:invfault="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/fault" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/framework/webservice/fault/v1-0" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/FaultRoot.xsd"/> <!--All The Exceptions and Fault Types are defined here--> <xsd:complexType name="InventoryFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Base Type for faults used in UIM. All unhandled exceptions are translated into Inventory Faults. This fault is used when the API raises any application exceptions.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="fault" type="appfault:ApplicationFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Error messages that are generated by the UIM API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ValidationFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fault Type for indicating a Request Validation/Validation errors in the API.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invfault:InventoryFaultType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--====================== Simple Element Definitions =================--> <xsd:element name="validationFault" type="invfault:ValidationFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Validation fault</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="inventoryFault" type="invfault:InventoryFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Inventory Fault. All unhandled exceptions are translated into Inventory Faults.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/businessinteraction" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:biws="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/businessinteraction" xmlns:invbi="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/businessinteraction" xmlns:invco="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/customobject" xmlns:invcom="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/common" xmlns:invconfig="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/configuration" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invfault="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/fault" xmlns:invld="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/logicaldevice" xmlns:invnum="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/number" xmlns:invparty="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" xmlns:invplace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" xmlns:invprop="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns:invrole="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:invsvc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--============= Imports Start =================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/common" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/InventoryCommon.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/webservice/fault" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/InventoryFaults.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/businessinteraction" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/BusinessInteraction.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Service.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Specification.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Property.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Place.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Party.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Role.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/customobject" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/CustomObject.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/logicaldevice" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/LogicalDevice.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/number" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Number.xsd"/> <!--==== Message Types ====--> <xsd:complexType name="CaptureInteractionRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CaptureInteractionRequestType holds the information to create or update a Business Interaction with a request to act upon the inventory. The action request carries the action and its input parameters.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:InventoryRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Interaction identifies the Business Interaction, which will be created or updated to provide the context in which the action will be performed. The id and name must be provided.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="executeProcess" nillable="false" type="xs:boolean"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>If true, the processInteraction operation will be executed after the captureInteraction. Default is false.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="responseLevel" type="biws:InteractionResponseLevelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This option controls the level of detail returned with the operation. Default is INTERACTION_ITEM_ENTITY_CONFIGURATION.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CaptureInteractionResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>CaptureInteractionResponseType holds the response of the CaptureInteraction operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:InventoryResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The BusinessInteraction capturing the action that is being requested.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CaptureInteractionFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fault that is specific to the CaptureInteraction operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invfault:InventoryFaultType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessInteractionRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ProcessInteractionRequestType invokes the rules to automatically perform a business interaction. Rules may automate the business interaction partially or completely. This operation is re-entrant to enable incrementally updating the inventory using a mix of automated and manual activities. Re-entrancy also enables the action request to be re-captured (i.e., to support order revision/amendment) and performed again.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:InventoryRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identify a Business Interaction by id or external id and automate its execution.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="responseLevel" type="biws:InteractionResponseLevelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This option controls the level of detail returned with the operation. Default is INTERACTION_ITEM_ENTITY_CONFIGURATION.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessInteractionResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ProcessInteractionResponseType holds the response of the ProcessInteraction operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:InventoryResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The BusinessInteraction capturing the action that is being requested.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ProcessInteractionFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fault that is specific to the ProcessInteraction operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invfault:InventoryFaultType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateInteractionRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>UpdateInteractionRequestType holds the request for UpdateInteraction operation. This operation updates the business interaction and transitions the business interaction, service and service configuration statuses.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:InventoryRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identify a Business Interaction by id and change its state according to the interaction action. This cascades the state change to its items.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="responseLevel" type="biws:InteractionResponseLevelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This option controls the level of detail returned with the operation. Default is INTERACTION_ITEM_ENTITY_CONFIGURATION.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateInteractionResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>UpdateInteractionResponseType holds the response of the UpdateInteraction operation operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:InventoryResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The BusinessInteraction that was acted upon.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="UpdateInteractionFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fault type to return any business faults within UpdateInteraction operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invfault:InventoryFaultType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GetInteractionRequestType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>GetInteractionRequestType retrieves a business interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:InventoryRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identify a Business Interaction by id.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="responseLevel" type="biws:InteractionResponseLevelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This option controls the level of detail returned with the operation. Default is INTERACTION_ITEM_ENTITY_CONFIGURATION.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GetInteractionResponseType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>GetInteractionResponseType holds the response of the GetInteraction operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invcom:InventoryResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The BusinessInteraction that is retrieved.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GetInteractionFaultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Fault that is specific to the GetInteraction operation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invfault:InventoryFaultType"/> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="InteractionResponseLevelEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Business Interaction Response Detail Level.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="INTERACTION"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Selecting this option would return only the interaction header section.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="INTERACTION_ITEM"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Selecting this option would return the interaction header section and the list of items. Not supported in this release.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="INTERACTION_ITEM_ENTITY"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Selecting this option would return the interaction header section and the list of items along with their associated entity. If the entity have configuration, they would not show.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="INTERACTION_ITEM_ENTITY_CONFIGURATION"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Selecting this option would return the interaction header section and the list of items along with their associated entity and their configuration. This option is equivalent to the legacy "expandedResponse" boolean with a value of "false".</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="INTERACTION_ITEM_ENTITY_CONFIGURATION_EXPANDED"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Selecting this option would return the interaction header section and the list of items along with their associated entity and their configuration. Plus, with this option, we drill down child-configuration. This option is equivalent to the legacy "expandedResponse" boolean with a value of "true".</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:element name="captureInteractionRequest" type="biws:CaptureInteractionRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="captureInteractionResponse" type="biws:CaptureInteractionResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="captureInteractionFault" type="biws:CaptureInteractionFaultType"/> <xsd:element name="processInteractionRequest" type="biws:ProcessInteractionRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="processInteractionResponse" type="biws:ProcessInteractionResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="processInteractionFault" type="biws:ProcessInteractionFaultType"/> <xsd:element name="updateInteractionRequest" type="biws:UpdateInteractionRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="updateInteractionResponse" type="biws:UpdateInteractionResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="updateInteractionFault" type="biws:UpdateInteractionFaultType"/> <xsd:element name="getInteractionRequest" type="biws:GetInteractionRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="getInteractionResponse" type="biws:GetInteractionResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="getInteractionFault" type="biws:GetInteractionFaultType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/businessinteraction" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invbi="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/businessinteraction" xmlns:invconfig="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/configuration" xmlns:invconn="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/connectivity" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invparty="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" xmlns:invplace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" xmlns:invprop="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns:invrole="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:invsvc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--============= Imports Start =================--> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Specification.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Property.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Service.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/connectivity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Connectivity.xsd"/> <!--==== Entity Value Types ====--> <xsd:complexType name="BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="header" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Business Interaction header information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="body" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionBodyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Business Interaction body detail information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--==== Data Types ====--> <xsd:complexType name="BusinessInteractionHeaderType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the header information of a Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="specification" nillable="false" type="invspec:SpecificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specification information of the Business Interaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="action" nillable="true" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Action for the Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="id" nillable="false" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ID of the Business Interaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the Business Interaction</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="description" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of the Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="externalIdentity" nillable="false" type="invent:ExternalIdentityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies the explicit identity of the business entity from the perspective of the external participant.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="state" nillable="true" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Current State of the Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="effectiveDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Effective Date (Due Date) of the Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" nillable="true" type="invprop:PropertyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Property holds the dynamic properties of a Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BusinessInteractionBodyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is the body detail information of a Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="item" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Each item represents an inventory entity that is involved in this Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="interaction" nillable="false" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Child Business Interactions.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ParameterType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is a named parameter to an action.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Each parameter is identified by its name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="value" type="xsd:anyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The parameter value can hold any valid XML Schema Type that corresponds to a class of entity in the inventory.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BusinessInteractionItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An item holds an entity that is involved in (acted upon by) the Business Interaction.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="externalIdentity" nillable="false" type="invent:ExternalIdentityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies the explicit identity of the business entity from the perspective of the external participant.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="action" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionItemActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Action for the item within interaction as part of the collection actions comprising the business interaction. The action values for an item are Add, Change, or Remove.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="service" nillable="true" type="invsvc:ServiceType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="connectivity" nillable="true" type="invconn:ConnectivityType"/> <xsd:element name="entity" type="xsd:anyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This element can hold any valid XML Schema Type that corresponds to a class of entity in the inventory.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="parameter" type="invbi:ParameterType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>These are the input parameters to the Business Interaction Item for a given Item action.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <!--the hierarchical relationship between bi items is not included in this definition--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--==== Entity Criteria Types ====--> <!--<xs:complexType name="BusinessInteractionCriteriaType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation> Criteria to uniquely identify a Business Interaction. </xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:complexType>--> <!--==== Enumerations ====--> <xsd:simpleType name="BusinessInteractionStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Business Interaction State</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="CREATED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IN_PROGRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COMPLETED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCELLED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="BusinessInteractionItemActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Business InteractionItem Action</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ADD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CHANGE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REMOVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NO_CHANGE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--<xs:simpleType name="StateChangePolicyEnum"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation> Defines valid values for StateChangePolicy </xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xs:enumeration value="TRANSITION_ALL_RELATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="TRANSITION_THIS_ONLY"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType>--> <xsd:simpleType name="BusinessInteractionActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Business Interaction Action.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="CREATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CHANGE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="APPROVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ISSUE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COMPLETE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--==== Elements ====--> <xsd:element name="interaction" type="invbi:BusinessInteractionType"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="EntityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>An inventory entity.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="entityNote" nillable="false" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ExternalIdentityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies the explicit identity of the business entity from the perspective of the external participant.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="externalObjectId" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Communicates a public unique identity or key for a business entity within the context of the domain specified by externalManagementDomain.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="externalName" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Provides a business meaningful name of the business entity (identified by externalObjectID) within context of the domain specified by externalManagementDomain.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="externalManagementDomain" nillable="false" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies an external system, name domain, party, or participant in a business entity exchange, cooperation, sharing or federation arrangement.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="1" name="externalArrangement" nillable="false" type="invent:ExternalArrangementTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the pre-established cooperation model between UIM and the external party for the given entity. The valid cooperation arrangements are LEASED_IN, LEASED_OUT, SHARED and FEDERATED.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResourceActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Resource Action</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="NONE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COMPLETE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="EntityActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Entity Actions</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ADD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DELETE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ExternalArrangementTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Entity Actions</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="LEASED_IN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="FEDERATED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LEASED_OUT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SHARED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--=================== Imports Start ====================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="SpecificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>SpecificationType holds the Specification information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" nillable="false" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the Specification</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="entityClass" nillable="false" type="invspec:EntityClassEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entity Class of the Specification. Example, Equipment, Pipe</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="description" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of the Specification</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="startDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Start Date of the Specification</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="endDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>End Date of the Specification</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="EntityClassEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="BusinessInteraction"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CustomObject"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DeviceInterface"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Equipment"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EquipmentHolder"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GeographicAddress"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GeographicLocation"/> <xsd:enumeration value="GeographicPlace"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>GeographicPlace is an abstract class. This enum value can be provided for polymorphic searches to indicate that the result set can include instances of any subclass. This class may not be used to create an instance. A specification will never be associated with this class.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> <xsd:enumeration value="GeographicSite"/> <xsd:enumeration value="InventoryGroup"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LogicalDevice"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LogicalDeviceAccount"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MediaStream"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Network"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NetworkAddress"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Party"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PhysicalConnector"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PhysicalDevice"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PhysicalPort"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Pipe"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Product"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Role"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Service"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ServiceConfigurationVersion"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TelephoneNumber"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="InventoryStateEnum"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="END_OF_LIFE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="INSTALLED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_INSTALL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_REMOVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_UNAVAILABLE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_AVAILABLE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PLANNED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UNAVAILABLE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invprop="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--=================== Imports Start ====================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="PropertyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>PropertyType holds a single dynamic property as a name-value pair.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xsd:element name="value" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="action" type="invent:EntityActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Action holds the property Action which indicates whether the property needs to be added/deleted/updated. Valid values for this element are defined by EntityActionEnum.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invbi="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/businessinteraction" xmlns:invconfig="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/configuration" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invparty="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" xmlns:invplace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" xmlns:invprop="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:invsvc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--============= Imports Start =================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/businessinteraction" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/BusinessInteraction.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Specification.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Property.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Place.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Party.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/configuration" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Configuration.xsd"/> <!--==== Entity Value Types ====--> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="specification" nillable="false" type="invspec:SpecificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specification of the Service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="id" nillable="false" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Id of the Service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="action" nillable="false" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is a specialized action on the service (or Entity). This is a free form value - based on agreement between external system and the Service Domain-specific Logic. The default values are 'Create', 'Disconnect', Change', 'Suspend', or 'Resume'.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the Service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="description" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of the Service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="externalIdentity" nillable="false" type="invent:ExternalIdentityType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specifies the explicit identity of the business entity from the perspective of the external participant.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="state" nillable="true" type="invsvc:ServiceStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Current State of the Service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="startDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Start Date of the Service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="endDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>End Date of the Service</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" nillable="true" type="invprop:PropertyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Property holds the dynamic properties of a Service.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="place" nillable="true" type="invplace:PlaceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Places that are associated with the Service. TODO: change to xs:string to return a list of place ids instead of place instances.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="party" nillable="true" type="invparty:PartyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Parties that are associated with the Service. TODO: change to xs:string to return a list of party ids instead of party instances.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="configuration" nillable="true" type="invconfig:ServiceConfigurationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Configuration Verions of a Service.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--==== Data Types ====--> <!--==== Entity Criteria Types ====--> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceCriteriaType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Criteria to uniquely identify a Service.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="serviceId" nillable="false" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="serviceState" nillable="false" type="invsvc:ServiceStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Current Service State</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--==== Enumerations ====--> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Service Action</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="NONE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COMPLETE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISCONNECT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUSPEND"/> <xsd:enumeration value="RESUME"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCEL_NOT_ISSUE"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Service State</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IN_SERVICE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_CANCEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCELLED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_DISCONNECT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISCONNECTED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCEL_PENDING_DISCONNECT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUSPENDED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="StateChangePolicyEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for StateChangePolicy</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="TransitionThisServiceOnly"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invplace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" xmlns:invprop="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns:invrole="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:invsvc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--=================== Imports Start ====================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Specification.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Role.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Property.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Service.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="PlaceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>PlaceType holds the Place information, along with Roles and Services that are associated with the Place</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="action" type="invent:EntityActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Action holds the place Action which indicates whether the place needs to be added or deleted from an Entity. Valid values for this element are defined by EntityActionEnum. NOTE: Only ADD and DELETE place are supported when updating an entity, the UPDATE is not supported. The place action is meant to add or delete the place/entity relationship. It's not meant to update the role information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="specification" nillable="false" type="invspec:SpecificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specification information of the Place.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="id" nillable="false" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>id is the unique key to identify a Place.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the Place</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="description" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of a Place</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="role" nillable="true" type="invrole:RoleType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Role information of the Place</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="startDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Start Date of the Place</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="endDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>End Date of the Place</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" nillable="true" type="invprop:PropertyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Property holds the dynamic properties of a Location, a Site or an Address.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="service" nillable="true" type="invsvc:ServiceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service that are associated to the Place. TODO: change to xs:string to return a list of service ids instead of service instances.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GeographicAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>GeographicAddressType holds the geographic address information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invplace:PlaceType"> <xsd:sequence/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GeographicLocationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>GeographicLocationType holds the geographic location information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invplace:PlaceType"> <xsd:sequence/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="GeographicSiteType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>GeographicSiteType holds the geographic site information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invplace:PlaceType"> <xsd:sequence/> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invrole="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--=================== Imports Start ====================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Specification.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="RoleType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RoleType holds the Role information. It contains the specification of the role.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="specification" nillable="true" type="invspec:SpecificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Role Specification information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invparty="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" xmlns:invprop="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns:invrole="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:invsvc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--=================== Imports Start ====================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Specification.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/role" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Role.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Property.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Service.xsd"/> <xsd:complexType name="PartyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>PlaceType holds the Party information, along with Roles and Services that are associated with the Party</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="action" type="invent:EntityActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Action holds the party Action which indicates whether the party needs to be added or deleted from an Entity. Valid values for this element are defined by EntityActionEnum. NOTE: Only ADD and DELETE party are supported when updating an entity, the UPDATE is not supported. The party action is meant to add or delete the party/entity relationship. It's not meant to update the role information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="specification" nillable="false" type="invspec:SpecificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specification holds the Party Specification information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="id" nillable="false" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>id holds the unique id of the Party</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the Party</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="description" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Description of the Party</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="role" nillable="true" type="invrole:RoleType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>RoleType holds the Role information for Party</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" nillable="true" type="invprop:PropertyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Property holds the dynamic properties of a Party.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="service" nillable="true" type="invsvc:ServiceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Services holds the service that are associated for the Party. TODO: change to xs:string to return a list of service ids instead of service instances.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/configuration" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invbi="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/businessinteraction" xmlns:invconfig="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/configuration" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invparty="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" xmlns:invplace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" xmlns:invprop="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:invsvc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--============= Imports Start =================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/businessinteraction" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/BusinessInteraction.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Specification.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Property.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Place.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/party" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Party.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/service" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Service.xsd"/> <!--==== Entity Value Types ====--> <xsd:complexType name="ConfigurationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ConfigurationType holds the Configuration Version.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="version" nillable="true" type="xs:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Version number (integer)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="previousVersion" nillable="true" type="xs:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Previous Configuration version number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="id" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Configuration Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="true" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the Configuration</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="action" nillable="true" type="invconfig:ConfigurationActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The type of action being designed in this Configuration.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="state" nillable="true" type="invconfig:ConfigurationStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Current state of the Configuration</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="startDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Start Date of the Configuration</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="endDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>End Date of the Configuration</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="effectiveDate" nillable="true" type="xsd:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Effective Date of the Configuration</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="configSpec" nillable="false" type="invspec:SpecificationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specification information of Configuration.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="configurationItem" type="invconfig:ConfigurationItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specification information of Configuration.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType abstract="true" name="ConfigurationItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Holds Configuration Item information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="false" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the Configuration Item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="configurationItem" nillable="true" type="invconfig:ConfigurationItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Child configuration items, if any.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="entityAssignment" nillable="true" type="invconfig:EntityAssignmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entity Assignment information, if any.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="entityReference" nillable="true" type="invconfig:EntityReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Entity Reference information, if any.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" nillable="true" type="invprop:PropertyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Property holds the dynamic properties of a Configuration Item.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EntityAssignmentType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EntityAssignmentType that holds entity assignment information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="state" nillable="false" type="invconfig:AssignmentStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Assignment state.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="entity" nillable="false" type="xsd:anyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The consumable entity that is assigned.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EntityReferenceType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>EntityReferenceType that holds entity reference information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="state" nillable="false" type="invconfig:ReferenceStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reference state.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="entity" nillable="false" type="xsd:anyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The consumable entity that is referenced.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResourceReservationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ResourceReservationType that holds resource reservation information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="state" nillable="false" type="invconfig:AssignmentStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Assignment state.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="reservationNumber" nillable="false" type="xs:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="reservationType" nillable="false" type="invconfig:ReservationTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="expiry" nillable="false" type="xs:dateTime"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="reservedForType" nillable="false" type="invconfig:ReservedForTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="reservedFor" nillable="false" type="xs:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation/> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="resource" nillable="true" type="xsd:anyType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The consumable resource that is reserved.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceConfigurationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ServiceConfigurationVersionType holds the Service Configuration Version information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invconfig:ConfigurationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="serviceConfigurationItem" type="invconfig:ServiceConfigurationItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Specification information of Configuration.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceConfigurationItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>...</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:restriction base="invconfig:ConfigurationItemType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="name" nillable="false" type="xs:string"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="configurationItem" nillable="true" type="invconfig:ServiceConfigurationItemType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="entityAssignment" nillable="true" type="invconfig:EntityAssignmentType"/> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="entityReference" nillable="true" type="invconfig:EntityReferenceType"/> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="property" nillable="true" type="invprop:PropertyType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--==== Entity Criteria Types ====--> <xsd:complexType name="ConfigurationCriteriaType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Criteria to uniquely identify a Service Configuration version.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="invent:EntityType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="configurationVersionNumber" nillable="false" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service Configuration Version Number</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="configurationId" nillable="false" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service Configuration Id</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="configurationState" nillable="false" type="invconfig:ConfigurationStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Current state of the Service Configuration Version.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--==== Enumerations ====--> <xsd:simpleType name="ConfigurationActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Configuration Action.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="NONE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UPDATE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="APPROVE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ISSUE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COMPLETE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ADD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CHANGE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISCONNECT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AssignmentActionEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for Assignment Action</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="ASSIGN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UNASSIGN"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ConfigurationStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for State of CofigurationState</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="IN_PROGRESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DESIGNED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ISSUED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COMPLETED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_CANCEL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CANCELLED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ReservationTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for ReservationType</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SHORTTERM"/> <xsd:enumeration value="LONGTERM"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ReservedForTypeEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for ReservationType</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="AREA"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CSR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CUSTOMER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ORDER"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PROJECT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SERVICE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SERVICE_SPEC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SUBSCRIBER"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AssignmentStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for AssignmentState</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_ASSIGN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ASSIGNED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_UNASSIGN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UNASSIGNED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DISCONNECTED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_AVAILABLE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_UNAVAILABLE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PORTED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UNAVAILABLE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TRANSITIONAL"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ReferenceStateEnum"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Defines valid values for AssignmentState</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xs:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_REFERENCE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REFERENCED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PENDING_UNREFERENCE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="UNREFERENCED"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/connectivity" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:invconn="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/connectivity" xmlns:invent="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" xmlns:invld="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/logicaldevice" xmlns:invplace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/place" xmlns:invprop="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/property" xmlns:invspec="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/specification" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--=================== Imports Start ====================--> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"/> <!--Local Imports--> <xsd:import namespace="http://xmlns.oracle.com/communications/inventory/entity" schemaLocation="http://localhost:9011/UIMServiceFulfillment/UIMServiceFulfillmentHTTP?WSDL/Entity.xsd"/> <xsd:import
